vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to increase the service contract with 22nd Century Technologies, Inc. through the Sourcewell cooperative agreement for the purchase, installation, hardware monitoring, and support of additional secondary backup circuits for the Department of Information and Technology Services - Not to exceed $694,629.80, from $12,583,720.40 to $13,278,350.20 - Financing:  Data Services Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
